name: stripe-seed
description: Stripe catalog seeding for Hookah+ MVP

scripts.setup: node -e "console.log('🔐 Run setup-secure.bat (Windows) or setup-secure.sh (Mac/Linux) to create .env file')"
scripts.seed:check: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); console.log('Environment check:', process.env.STRIPE_SECRET_KEY ? '✅ Key found' : '❌ No key'); console.log('Key starts with sk_test_:', process.env.STRIPE_SECRET_KEY?.startsWith('sk_test_') ? '✅' : '❌')"
scripts.postinstall: echo '🔐 Run npm run setup to create secure environment file'

author: Hookah+ Team
